# Note

This document was created from the commit with the hash: ``r repro::current_hash()``.   

# Setup

```{r}
library(repro)
automate_load_packages()
automate_load_scripts()
xy <- automate_load_data(xy, read_csv)
```

# Analysis

```{r}
xy %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal()
```
